hero.title: Design a customer journey that learns and responds instantly
hero.description: Empower visitors to register, authenticate, and complete their profile with crystal-clear steps and responsive guidance. Every screen is tuned for accessibility and mobile responsiveness.

adaptiveOnboarding.title: Adaptive onboarding
adaptiveOnboarding.description: Serve contextual steps based on segment, geography, and progression stage.

trustedAuth.title: Trusted authentication
trustedAuth.description: Offer Google and email login paths with progressive security requirements.

telemetry.title: Telemetry & insight
telemetry.description: Monitor conversion health and inform subscription recommendations in real time.

oneFlow.title: One flow, all devices
oneFlow.description: Delight users with a consistent path from welcome screen to activation in under three steps.

securityFirst.title: Security-first foundations
securityFirst.description: Guard sessions with rotating tokens, managed secrets, and AI-assisted alerts.

register.title: Trusted access to Tools Dashboard
register.description: Use Google or email plus password. We will guide you through verification immediately after.

login.title: Welcome back to Tools Dashboard
login.description: Pick Google or your email and password to resume your secure workspace.

aside.title: What to expect next
aside.step1: Check your inbox for a verification email. We only activate accounts once the address is confirmed.
aside.step2: Jump straight into progressive profiling so we can tailor product access to your role and goals.
aside.step3: Session cookies keep you signed in securely across devices with automatic rotation.

support.title: Need help?
support.description: Email <1>support@tools-dashboard.io</1> and a specialist will get you unstuck.
